hero.name: T. Rex
hero.specialAbility: T-Rex is a large fighter. (She can attack up to 2 spaces away.) At the end of your turn, draw a card.

cards.title: You're Just Making Her Angry
cards.afterText: If you won the combat, return this card to your hand.

cards.title: Closer Than She Appears
cards.basicText: Move your fighter up to 1 space. Draw 1 card. Gain 1 action.

cards.title: 15,000 Pounds of Muscle
cards.duringText: Ignore the value of your opponent's card.

cards.title: Thrash
cards.afterText: If you won the combat, deal 1 damage to each opposing fighter in T-Rex's zone.

cards.title: Reckless Lunge
cards.afterText: Deal 3 damage to the opposing fighter. Then, take 3 damage.

cards.title: When Dinosaurs Ruled the Earth
cards.afterText: If you won the combat, draw 1 card, gain 1 action, and take 2 damage.

cards.title: 65 Million Years of Gut Instinct
cards.basicText: Choose a card in your discard pile other than "65 Million Years of Gut Instinct" and return it to your hand.

cards.title: Terrifying Roar
cards.immediateText: Fighters cannot leave their spaces for the rest of the turn.

cards.title: Ripples in the Water
cards.basicText: Place T-Rex in any space in her zone. Then, each opponent with a fighter adjacent to T-Rex discards 1 random card.

cards.title: Momentous Shift
cards.duringText: If your fighter started this turn in a different space, this card's value is 5 instead.
